_description: Arnaldus de Villa Nova — fifty-three couplets

BLHar2407.First Lines: Now I schal here begynneto teche the now a conclusion…
BLHar2407.Last Lines: …Now I have taght þe how þu schal doþe blys of hevyn god bryng hus to
BLHar2407.Attributed Author: Explicit arnoldis de nova Deo gracia (rubric, f. 31v)
BLHar2407.Editions:
Ashmole,  Elias. 
             Theatrum Chemicum Britannicum.
         London: J. Grimond, 1652: 344-7.
